trends: There have been no other sightings in Limerick
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI Was At Home On The 3th Floor And As I Do Was Looking Out The Window Looking At The Weather. I Looked Down The Town An In The Sky A Light Cough My Eye,I Knew It Was Not Right At All,At First I Was Like What The F@@k and Then I Was Looking For My Camera Only To Have Let In My Sisters 2 Nights Ago It Was Her Daughter Debs..Well I Kept Looking It Was Like A Ball of Fire Tumbling But Not Falling,It moved To The South Blinked Out And let A Trace Of Clouds Behind In,Im Almost Sure I See A Oval Shaped Craft Behind It,It Seem To Melt Or Blend In To The Clouds...Ps its Not The First Time I See Such Things......
Summary: In The East Was A Ball Of Light About 500meters Above The City ,Under The Clouds It Looked Like It Was On Fire,It Moved Then Blinked OUT.
